thread.title: Great Hotel at convenient location.
thread.title_full: Great Hotel at convenient location. - Review of Balmoral Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jeeveedeecee
title: Great Hotel at convenient location.
text:
Beautiful hotel close to the Champs Elys√©es and next to the Arc De Triomphe. There is a subway stop around the corner.
The breakfast is very good and the hotels offers a Smartphone that you are free to use during your stay. This is particularly convenient for finding directions.
